document.full_text: half a century of expertise in dealing with disasters in japan, where earthquakes are a way of life, probably saved thousands of lives after friday's massive tremor, but even that finely honed response system could not prevent widespread devastation.
document.title: japan's top-notch tsunami preparation may have prevented worst
lines_and_colors: half a century of expertise in dealing with disasters in japan, where earthquakes are a way of life, probably saved thousands of lives after friday's massive tremor, but even that finely honed response system could not prevent widespread devastation.
